name: StressEchocardiography
title: Stress Echocardiography
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with Stress Echocardiography.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Stress Echocardiography.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with Stress Echocardiography are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Stress Echocardiography are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)

concept.display: Echocardiography, transthoracic, real-time with image documentation (2D), includes M-mode recording, when performed, during rest and cardiovascular stress test using treadmill, bicycle exercise and/or pharmacologically induced stress, with interpretation and report

Echocardiography, transthoracic, real-time with image documentation (2D), includes M-mode recording, when performed, during rest and cardiovascular stress test using treadmill, bicycle exercise and/or pharmacologically induced stress, with interpretation and report; including performance of continuous electrocardiographic monitoring, with supervision by a physician or other qualified health care professional

contains.display: Echocardiography, transthoracic, real-time with image documentation (2D), includes M-mode recording, when performed, during rest and cardiovascular stress test using treadmill, bicycle exercise and/or pharmacologically induced stress, with interpretation and report
